Package se.arkalix

Interface ArServiceDescriptionCache

  • public interface ArServiceDescriptionCache
    A local service registry, maintaining descriptions of known remote services whose service registry entries have not yet expired.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clear()
      Empties cache.
      java.util.stream.Stream<ServiceDescription> getAll()
      Returns ordered stream of all services in cache.
      java.util.stream.Stream<ServiceDescription> getByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets stream of all services in cache matching given name.
      default java.util.stream.Stream<ServiceDescription> getByNameAndInterfaces​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<InterfaceDescriptor> interfaces)
      Gets stream of all services in cache matching given name and supporting at least one of the specified interfaces.
      default java.util.stream.Stream<ServiceDescription> getByNameAndInterfaces​(java.lang.String name, InterfaceDescriptor... interfaces)
      Gets stream of all services in cache matching given name and supporting at least one of the specified interfaces.
      default void update​(java.util.Collection<ServiceDescription> services)
      Adds or replaces existing service entries in cache.
      void update​(java.util.stream.Stream<ServiceDescription> services)
      Adds or replaces existing service entries in cache.
      default void update​(ServiceDescription... services)
      Adds or replaces existing service entries in cache.
      static ArServiceDescriptionCache withDefaultEntryLifetimeLimit()
      Creates a new service cache that will not hold on to provided service descriptions for longer than a default duration.
      static ArServiceDescriptionCache withEntryLifetimeLimit​(java.time.Duration entryLifetimeLimit)
      Creates a new service cache that will not hold on to provided service descriptions for longer than specified by the given entryLifetimeLimit.

    • Method Detail

      • withDefaultEntryLifetimeLimit

        static ArServiceDescriptionCache withDefaultEntryLifetimeLimit()
        Creates a new service cache that will not hold on to provided service descriptions for longer than a default duration.
        Returns:
        New service cache.

      • withEntryLifetimeLimit

        static ArServiceDescriptionCache withEntryLifetimeLimit​(java.time.Duration entryLifetimeLimit)
        Creates a new service cache that will not hold on to provided service descriptions for longer than specified by the given entryLifetimeLimit.
        Parameters:
        entryLifetimeLimit - Duration after which service descriptions added to this cache become stale and are removed, even if they explicitly specify a later expiration time.
        Returns:
        New service cache.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Empties cache.

      • getByName

        java.util.stream.Stream<ServiceDescription> getByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets stream of all services in cache matching given name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name to search for.
        Returns:
        Stream of matching service descriptions.

                                                                           InterfaceDescriptor... interfaces)
        Gets stream of all services in cache matching given name and supporting at least one of the specified interfaces.
        Parameters:
